programme.title: 5 chefs dans ma cuisine
programme.sub-title: Magret de canard et riz sauvage
programme.desc: Breast of duck with wild rice Two recipes by Lysanne O'Bomsawin, inspired by Abenaki culture: breast of duck with spruce beer sauce and wild rice with cranberries and hazelnuts. Presented by: Marina Orsini. Directed by: Nicole Dussault, David Gauthier, Stéphane Rocheleau, Léo Boulanger (Canada, 2020)

programme.title: Ô la belle vie
programme.desc: Meyrueis, a visionary village In the Jonte Gorges and at the foot of Mont Aigoual, Meyrueis is where the Causses meet the Cévennes. A wild unspoilt valley where villages are rare. Meyrueis itself is home to only 800 inhabitants for a surface area equivalent to that of Paris. Presented by: Sophie Jovillard.

programme.title: Ricardo
programme.desc:
Dal and raviolis
To prepare smoked salmon raviolis and dal with sweet potato spirals, Ricardo makes life easy with shop-bought ingredients.
Presented by: Ricardo Larrivée.

programme.title: Sur les sentiers de l'histoire
programme.desc:
In the Valley of Mankind

From Montignac-Lascaux to Les Eyzies-de-Tayac, forty short kilometres concentrate an impressive inventory of prehistoric sites. It's here on the banks of the Vézère, in the valley of the same name, that mankind settled and flourished in the Dordogne for a period of 50,000 years.

Directed by: Denis Dommel (France, 2019)

programme.title: Les petites bulles
programme.desc: A boat on the water Bernard turned his passion into his profession. He thinks of himself as a freshwater sailor, a frogman who's half monkey, since he also looks after a host of odd jobs on and around the yachts and up their masts...

programme.title: Massi en mission
programme.sub-title: Vrai ou faux : satellites en orbite
programme.desc: The astronaut David Saint-Jacques challenges the YouTuber Massi Mahiou to prepare for a future space mission. But how exactly do astronauts train? What sort of experiments do they carry out? How do they live with zero gravity? Massi discovers all he needs to know about the mission and about space.

programme.title: L'Afrik en conte
programme.desc: The fly Why has the fly become an insect that everyone detests, so much so that humans have even created a fly whisk to fight it ? Directed by: Franck Fokus (Côte d'Ivoire, 2022)

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
Time to bully off!
The Red Lions are Belgian and they're world hockey champions. Rocky and Lily want to find out more about the sport.
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: Confidences à un inconnu
programme.desc:
Saint Petersburg, 1907. Natalia has all she needs for happiness: delightful son, rich husband who lets her live her life as she chooses, lovers who desire her. But that afternoon, a chance meeting with a stranger and a secret wish whispered to a bird change her tranquil life forever...

Directed by: Georges Bardawil (France/Switzerland/Italy.1994)

Cast: Sandrine Bonnaire, William Hurt, Jerzy Radziwilowicz

Genre: Dramedy

programme.title: Marianne
programme.desc:
Episode 5: Thanatos
The remains of a train driver have been found on a railway line. All the clues point to him having been knocked unconscious then placed on the rails whilst waiting for a train to pass. Investigating the case, Marianne finds each new detail more disturbing than the last.
Directed by: Alexandre Charlot, Franck Magnier, Myriam Vinocour (France, 2022) Cast: Marilou Berry (Marianne Vauban), Alexandre Steiger (Raphaël Pastor), Stéphane Pezerat (Yves), Denis Mpunga (Public Prosecutor Konate), Laurent Olmedo (Superintendent Franco), Alka Balbir (Selma), Drimi Gouttebel (Zacharie) Genre: thriller

programme.title: Marianne
programme.desc:
Episode 6: Immortal
The wreck of a trawler lost nine years earlier has been found. Amongst the bones brought to the surface is a much fresher body, that of Vincent, the captain everyone thought had gone down with the ship. Marianne asks Aurore, Vincent's daughter, for help infiltrating the world of deep-sea fishing.
Directed by: Alexandre Charlot, Franck Magnier, Myriam Vinocour (France, 2022) Cast: Marilou Berry (Marianne Vauban), Alexandre Steiger (Raphaël Pastor), Stéphane Pezerat (Yves), Denis Mpunga (Public Prosecutor Konate), Laurent Olmedo (Superintendent Franco), Alka Balbir (Selma), Drimi Gouttebel (Zacharie) Genre: thriller

programme.title: Des racines & des ailes
programme.desc: All the flavour of Quebec Exploring the city of Quebec, all the way to the Saguenay Fjords National Park, in deep mid-winter then in autumn as the forest dons its most vibrant colours. With historian and photographer Pierre Lahoud, we fly over the icebound Saint Lawrence, one of the world's most dangerous navigable waterways. Directed by: Lucile Bellanger (France, 2021)

programme.title: 5e rang
programme.desc: Episode 18 Vince is terrorising Valmont and continues to bully Paul. Is his employee, Jean-Michel, running too high a risk by trying to take the law into his own hands? Réginald is in a state of shock when he upsets the convivial meal organised at home by Marie-Luce. Directed by: Francis Leclerc (Canada, 2019) Cast: Maude Guérin (Marie-Luce), Martine Francke (Marie-Louise), Julie Beauchemin (Marie-Christine), Catherine Renaud (Marie-Jeanne), Ève Duranceau (Marie-Paule), Maxime De Cotret (Réginald), Marie-Ève Milot (Julie), Frédéric Pierre (Nicolas), Julie Roussel (Gladys), Julie Du Page (Sophie), François Papineau (Charles) Genre: drama

programme.title: 5e rang
programme.desc: Episode 19 Still hiding on the farm, Jean-Michel fears for his life. Back in Florida, Francine still hasn't given up on inheriting the farm, much to Marie-Luce's despair. Julie has finally returned to Valmont for good. Directed by: Francis Leclerc (Canada, 2019) Cast: Maude Guérin (Marie-Luce), Martine Francke (Marie-Louise), Julie Beauchemin (Marie-Christine), Catherine Renaud (Marie-Jeanne), Ève Duranceau (Marie-Paule), Maxime De Cotret (Réginald), Marie-Ève Milot (Julie), Frédéric Pierre (Nicolas), Julie Roussel (Gladys), Julie Du Page (Sophie), François Papineau (Charles) Genre: drama

programme.title: Un été à la Garoupe
programme.desc:
La Garoupe, Antibes, 1937. Over the summer, painter and photographer Man Ray films his friends Pablo Picasso, Dora Maar, Paul Éluard, Nusch and Lee Miller. For a few weeks, in the insouciance and creativity of the interwar period, love, friendship, poetry, photography and painting mix. 

Directed by: François Lévy-Kuentz (France, 2020)

programme.title: TV5MONDE, le journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.
